text: Clean your hands.  Clean the potatoes. Use a vegetable peeler or a kitchen knife to remove their skin (or leave it on for more nutrients). Cut the potatoes into equally sized pieces.  Boil some water. Prepare a steamer by placing it over the boiling water. Steam the potatoes until medium soft. Drain the cooking water in a colander. Mash the cooked potatoes. Mash with butter, salt, mayonnaise, and milk. Cut the green onion into small pieces. Sprinkle the chopped green onion on top, or mix it in. Serve. Put the steamed mashed potatoes in a nice dish and serve with anything you’d like.
